text: Henry Bindley Sidwell (1857 – 31 August 1936) was the first Bishop of George, the first South African-born bishop to head a diocese. "The Clergy List" London, John Phillips, 1900 He was born in Grahamstown and educated at the University of the Cape of Good Hope. Ordained in 1889 he began his career with a curacy in Johannesburg after which he was rector of Middleburg and then Archdeacon of Pretoria before his appointment to the episcopate. He died in post on 31 August 1936. == Publications == * * == References == == External links == * Wits historical papers * Category:1857 births Category:People from Makhanda, Eastern Cape Category:University of South Africa alumni Category:Archdeacons of Pretoria Category:20th-century Anglican bishops Category:Bishops of George Category:1936 deaths
title: Henry Sidwell
